sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "./ContactUs.css" import axios from 'axios' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import { useState } from "react" const ContactUs = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_77zg6j5' , 'template_8ar6i1u', e.target,'Bc6zp71L3vdtqZ1wO') .then(res=> { console.log(res); }).catch(err=> console.log(err)); } const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", city: "", course: "", webinar: "", event: "", business: "", college: "", paidInternship: "", message: "" }) let name , value; const handleInputs = (e) =>{ console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value}) } const current = new Date(); const date = `${current.getDate()}-${current.getMonth()+1}-${current.getFullYear()}`; const submitData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const{ name, phone, email, city, course, webinar, event, business, college, paidInternship, message} = user; if (name && phone && email && college && message) { const res = fetch(`https://teslaev-c75c3-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/userDataRecord/${date}/${name}.json`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ name, phone, email, city, course, webinar, event, business, college, paidInternship, message }), } ); if (res) { setUser({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", city: "", course: "", webinar: "", event: "", business: "", college: "", paidInternship: "", message: "" }); alert("Data Stored"); } else { alert("plz fill the data"); } } else { alert("plz fill the data"); } }; return ( <>

) } export default ContactUs
